'''v0.7.6 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' released on October 11, 2013 for Android and on October 16, 2013 on iOS. It improves servers and fixes some of the bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.7.5 alpha|v0.7.5]].

== Changes ==

* Changed icon from [[File:Pocket Edition App Store icon 2.png|32px]] to [[File:Pocket Edition App Store icon 2,5.png|32px]] on iOS.<ref>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AIv3N0wFGG0</ref>{{better source}}
* New keyboard design for iOS 7.
* Realms servers are now displayed in alphabetical order.
* The way to access Realms was moved from the "Play on Realms" button in the main menu to the "Invited to Realms Alpha?" section in the options menu.
** Despite being removed, the "Play on Realms" button still can be selected with the Xperia Play controller.
* The "Disconnected from server" kick message has been replaced with a proper kick screen.

* Fixed a crash when a chest or furnace containing air is opened.</onlyinclude>
